entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
